title: Did I get enrolled in a Android trusted tester program?
content:
When updating to the Jan. security patch 9n my Pixel 4, I got this message:

"Hi Trusted Testers! This update fixes critical bugs and improves the performance and stability of your device. Cheers!"

I searched around a bit and found Google has several "Trusted Tester" programs. Is this a normal "update text", or did I somehow get into a trusted tester program? (I haven't gotten any notifications/emails/texts about it)

Thanks!
